per_frame_1=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.91+1.3);
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.3) + 0.4*sin(0.98*time));
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.1) + 0.4*sin(0.78*time));
per_frame_5=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.2) + 0.4*sin(0.6*time));
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=q8=wave_r;
per_frame_8=q7=wave_b;

per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=wave_r = 0.7;
per_frame_13=wave_b = 0.1;

per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=wr = 0.5+0.4*(0.6*sin(time*1.8) + 0.4*sin(0.8*time));
per_frame_19=wb = 0.5+0.4*(0.6*sin(time*1.67) + 0.4*sin(0.5*time));
per_frame_20=wg = 0.5+0.4*(0.6*sin(time*1.92) + 0.4*sin(0.4*time));
per_frame_21=monitor=vol;
per_frame_22=q10=wr;
per_frame_23=q11=wb;
per_frame_24=q12=wg;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=q18 = 0.007*sin(time*0.1);
per_frame_28=q17 = -0.007*sin(time*0.254);
per_frame_29=q2=bass_thresh;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=vol=(bass+mid+treb)*0.25;
per_frame_32=vol=vol*vol;
per_frame_33=q3=vol;
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=//warp=0;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`    float3 rc = GetPixel(uv)+GetBlur1(uv);//+GetPixel(uv);
warp_6=`    float2 ruv = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*(1+(rc.y*0.03));  
warp_7=`
warp_8=`    ruv = frac(float2(ruv.x+pow(rc.x,q18), ruv.y+pow(rc.x, q17)));
warp_9=`    
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_fc_main, float2(ruv.x, ruv.y)).xyz;
warp_12=`    
warp_13=`    float3 noise2 = lerp(float3(0,0,0),float3(q10,q11,q12), ret.x);    
warp_14=`
warp_15=`    
warp_16=`    ret += saturate(cross((ret), (noise2)));
warp_17=`    ret *= 1; 
warp_18=`    
warp_19=`
warp_20=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    
comp_5=`    ret *= 1.14; //gamma
comp_6=`    ret *= ret; //darken
comp_7=`}
